TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAppLinks

Docs.summary: Interface that defines the methods that are required for registering and deregistering links to content in apps.
Docs.remarks: Developers should note that extra steps are required to enable deep linking on the Android platform. See the related article that is linked below.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeregisterLink(class System.Uri appLinkUri) cil managed

Docs.param: The that represents the link to remove from the app index.
Docs.summary: Removes the provided application link from the application index.
Docs.remarks: This method has no effect on the Android platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeregisterLink(class Xamarin.Forms.IAppLinkEntry appLink) cil managed

Docs.param: The to remove from the app index.
Docs.summary: Removes the provided application link from the application index.
Docs.remarks: This method has no effect on the Android platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterLink(class Xamarin.Forms.IAppLinkEntry appLink) cil managed

Docs.param: The to add to the app index.
Docs.summary: Adds the provided application link to the application index.
